casebody.data:
Jennifer SCOTT
v.
GALLERIA OPERATING CO., L.L.C., Feil Organization, L.L.C., Feil Organization Louisiana, L.L.C., Broadwall Management Corporation, Chubb Services Corporation, and US Specialty Insurance Company NO. 2017-C-2080 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 9, 2018 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.
